unsettling adjective
(WORRYING)
causing worry or anxiety: One of the documentary's many unsettling images is of a child playing with her father's gun.

unsettling adjective
(CHANGEABLE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
that causes sudden, unexpected changes: A rise in unemployment has an unsettling effect on the stock market.
unsettling adjective
(ANXIOUS)
making you feel anxious and worried: I received the unsettling news that I may lose my job next month.
